title: Logitech’s new webcams are an alternative to Apple Desk View
description: Logitech unveiled their newest Brio 500 webcam and Zone Vibe headphones today, taking aim at the large workforce still stuck at home using Zoom and Teams.

title: Nvidia RTX 40-series will let you ramp up the power draw for more performance
description: Nvidia's next-gen RTX 40-Series GPUs may come with monstrous power requirements, but they also might have a perk -- a configurable TGP.

title: 3 upcoming gaming monitors worth getting excited about
description: 2022 has already been a landmark year for gaming monitors, but it's only going to get better.

title: Intel accidentally leaks Raptor Lake specs, with one major surprise
description: Intel has just leaked the official Raptor Lake specifications by accident. There's one major surprise regarding the clock speeds of these CPUs.

title: Queen’s final flight becomes most tracked ever
description: Queen Elizabeth’s final flight on Tuesday has become the most tracked in history, according to an online service that gathers such data.

title: Meet BILL, Nike’s sneaker-cleaning robot
description: Keen to burnish its green credentials by making sneakers last as long as possible, Nike has come up with a brush-laden bot called BILL.
